Description:
Calling all investors!
Situated in this sought-after location of Derrimut, this home will surely be the property to add to any investment portfolio. Offering a light filled kitchen overlooking the spacious dining and living area, fit for the whole family to enjoy. Four great sized bedrooms, master with WIR and a full ensuite while the other bedrooms with BIR's are serviced by a central bathroom. Other features include dishwasher, ducted heating and split system air conditioner and a double car garage with remote control. Secured tenancy until 2020 with monthly rent of $1477 per calendar month. Don't miss this opportunity to secure this amazing investment.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Everyone seems to dream of owning their own little slice of paradise, well here is an opportunity to own a huge slice. On an enormous allotment of approx. 774sqm proudly stands one of the suburbs most beautifully presented and maintained properties, thoughtfully designed with family living and entertaining in mind. Offering everything and more than you could ever desire the home comprises a sensational kitchen that overlooks the dining, family, rumpus and amazing alfresco which is highlighted by a feature wood fire pizza oven. This area then spills out into your magnificent rear yard that provides an abundance of space for the kids to play, plenty of room for a vegetable patch to satisfy that keen gardener and an enormous amount of off street secure parking for cars, caravans, boats, trailers or a work shed with easy access to the backyard from either the rear roller door of the garage or a large gated side access. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with fitted WIR and luxurious ensuite, with 3 additional bedrooms serviced by the superb main bathroom. A separate study, huge laundry and extra oversized remote garage with internal access and storage in roof complete this special property. A life of being surrounded by lush beautiful gardens and waking up each morning basking in a sense of serenity, space and freedom usually only reserved for country living has arrived in the city for one lucky purchaser. Please note full list of features will be provided upon inspection.

Description:
Spacious home on a large allotment of 677m2 (approx )
This spacious home is nestled in the beautiful Derrimut estate within short distance to the Derrimut Village shopping centre, primary schools, child care, public transport and has easy access onto the freeway. Set on a large allotment of 677 approx. Superbly spacious, this stunning residence has 4 large bedrooms. Main bedroom includes ensuite bathroom and walk in robe. Multiple living areas include bright open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space overlooking the meals and family area in addition to the oversize formal living area. The house is serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet, laundry and double car garage with access to a large enclosed entertaining area. Extras includes ducted heating, evaporative cooling and much more for your convenience.
**PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS**

Description:
An Ideal Beginning
Located only minutes away from parks, schools, Derrimut Village Shopping Centre and easy access to the Western Freeway, this brick veneer home will appeal to investors and first home buyers.
Positioned in a quiet pocket of Derrimut, this property showcases 4 good sized bedrooms (all with BIR, including master with full ensuite), two spacious living/dining areas, well designed kitchen featuring multiple storage units and dishwasher, central bathroom, ducted heating throughout, motorised double garage with access to backyard and an undercover veranda perfect for outdoor entertainment.
Call us today to arrange an inspection.
Inspections will impress! – Edward Truong 0402 621 234

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
This beautifully presented and lovingly maintained home is an absolute credit to its current owners and promises to provide many years of joyous living and precious memories for one lucky new purchaser. The fantastic design comprises magnificent kitchen encompassed by 5 living and entertaining zones including lounge, dining, family, theatre/rumpus room and alfresco. By opening the bifold door all these areas intertwine creating a huge indoor/ outdoor zone perfect for entertaining large numbers of family and friends. Sleeping quarters comprise enormous master bedroom with fantastic fitted WIR and twin vanity, oversize shower ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms serviced by the quality main bathroom and a separate study just off the master that can be easily used as a 5th bedroom or nursery. Completing the property is a double remote garage with internal access, massive rear yard with side access and large powered work shed. The time has come for one lucky purchaser to spoil themselves with the upgrades and luxury refinements of this special home. Please note full list of special features will be provided upon inspection.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Approximately 26 squares in total and highlighted by impressive dimensions, all rooms in this home can only be described as extra oversized. Enjoy 4 massive bedrooms serviced by 2 great bathrooms, 2 huge living areas, an enormous kitchen and large alfresco perfect for outdoor entertaining. Other features include ducted heating, laundry with direct access to outside, cooling, double remote garage with internal access and good size yard with potential to create side access to the rear for additional secure car spaces or storage for a boat or caravan as there is ample space on the side of the home. This property is perfect for the investor or first home buyer that wants to enter the market at an affordable level before prices rise even further. Be quick this home screams value in a booming Derrimut market.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale & Leggo Real Estate proudly present 96 Windsor Boulevard Derrimut, a single level sensation of enormous proportions and quite simply one of the finest homes to ever grace the Derrimut market place. An ex display home by renowned builder Metricon, this award winning Byron design offers every conceivable luxury and is highlighted by an amazing indoor/outdoor entertaining zone, state of the art bathrooms and kitchen. I could go on for hours mentioning all the standout features associated with this magnificent residence but in this case I will just let the photos speak for themselves. Inspection highly recommended and prepare to be blown away when you see exactly what is on offer. Please note all buyers will receive a full list of special features upon inspection. The rare opportunity to secure a home most people can only dream of owning awaits one lucky purchaser.
DISCLAIMER# PLEASE NOTE Video is of when this property was a display home with Metricon. Photos depict the property in its current state.

Description:
PERFECT FOR THE FAMILY!
In Room Auction: Thursday 14th December 2017 at 7:00 pm at our office located at Ray White Caroline Springs, Shop 8/234 Caroline Springs Boulevard, Caroline Springs
Situated in one of Derrimuts most peaceful pockets, this attractive home appeals at first sight. Resting on a modest block of approximately 532m², this family home boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a double garage. The master bedroom contains a full ensuite equipped with a double shower and WIR.
Featuring a state of the art theatre, heating, cooling, high ceilings, solar panels and much more, this home is sure to impress. Only a stones throw away from all the local amenities such as shops, schools and public transport, with the Western Freeway only moments away, convenience is at your front door.
Dont miss the opportunity to secure this property, enquire for an inspection now!

Description:
The Height of Glamour
Experience the height of glamour across the lavish expanse of this polished executive residence. Commanding a strong presence, this contemporary design and superb double storey residence offering streamlined, light-bathed interiors with spacious dimensions and a thoughtful layout, is the ultimate option for those seeking a stylish yet low maintenance lifestyle.
Comprising of:
- Four large bedrooms, all with WIR’s, master with ensuite
- Two bathrooms with additional powder room
- Theater room with a walk-in closet and can be used as a fifth bedroom
- Two separate living areas plus a study
- Open plan kitchen/formal dining
- Under cover alfresco
- Double lock up garage
The array of premium extras include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, feature fire place, engineered spotted gum floor boards, Bosch appliances with 900mm cook top and dishwasher, thick 60mm Cesar stone bench top, two pack cupboards, frameless shower glass, 2.7m height on the ground level, two garden sheds, veggie patch, solar boasted hot water system, soft light switches, exposed aggregate drive way and so much more.
Perfectly located near the freeway exit, Balmoral park reserve and Tullamarine airport, the local shops including Derrimut Village shops, a medical centre and IGA are within close reach. Also Derrimut and St Lawrence Primary schools are nearby. Deer park train station is a short drive and the bus stop is around the corner. Arguably this is the best home on the market today in Derrrimut. Don't let this rare opportunity to find a quality family home pass you by. Enquire today!
Insights: 8 Sinclair Green, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
The Essence Of Modern Excellence
Located in the ever-popular suburb of Derrimut, this immaculate townhouse residence offers complete style, comfort and convenience, with appeal to all first home buyers and investors, this is truly an opportunity that cannot be missed. Looking over Balmoral Park and only moments away from both St Lawrence & Derrimut Primary School, Derrimut Village, Deer Park Train Station, Western Freeway Access, childcare centres and public transport.
Comprising of 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIRs, master with WIR, full ensuite & balcony, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances & adjoining meals area with access to outdoor entertainment area, separate formal lounge room, upstairs spacious lounge room, bright central bathroom, downstairs powder room, separate laundry, low maintenance courtyard and a sizeable single car garage with remote & internal access.
Features: Study nook, split system x5, corner bath, balcony views, high ceilings, 202L water tank and landscaped gardens.

Description:
When quality meets beautiful family living
Step inside this loving home and be amazed at what it has to offer. Set in a prime pocket of Derrimut, this beautiful home will tick off all your boxes. Comprising of 3 generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and en-suite with double vanity. In the hub of the home, you'll be greeted with a quality kitchen, stainless steel appliances with stone bench tops, which overlooks the meals area and light filled dining room. Adding to this complete package is a formal lounge and large study or 4th bedroom. Step outside and be awaited by the undercover alfresco which leads to the beautiful decking and flawless landscaped garden.
Other features include ducted heating, downlights throughout, double garage and internal access.
Call today as an inspection won't disappoint.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale and Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 33 Hammerwood Avenue Derrimut , a property that provides so many options and simply oozes money making potential that any serious buyer would be absolutely crazy to pass up.
On a enormous block on approx. 807sqm so rare in a new estate this close to the city , this much loved property is further enhanced by being situated in Derrimut's best pocket and would perfectly suit buyers looking for the following:
1. A lifestyle choice. Raise your family in one of Derrimut's premier positions enjoying the lifestyle of having all amenities including schools, parks, golf course, Derrimut Village and Deer Park train station just a leisurely stroll from your front door.
2. With mature trees and an abundance of space enjoy the peace and tranquillity of a country lifestyle with city access convenience.
3. Enhance the home turning it into one of Derrimut's finest by adding a pool to compliment the fantastic outdoor entertainment area or tradespeople can add a huge shed to the rear whilst still retaining plenty of outdoor space.
4. Developers and investors can explore the possibility of subdividing the rear yard (STCA) with plenty of space for an additional dwelling on this easement free allotment with second driveway and over 5m clearance from the side boundary. Potential rental returns of approx. $900PW by adding another dwelling or sell off and profit.
5. Live in or rent out long term knowing that into the future this huge potential packed allotment in an ultimate location will ensure great capital growth and the option of a lucrative and prized redevelopment when the day comes that you decide to cash in on this super investment.
33 Hammerwood Avenue Derrimut , the investment that could set you up for life and the property you just have to buy will be auctioned on Saturday the 2nd December at 2PM. See you at the auction.

Make your Dreams Come True
A great opportunity to secure this parcel of land with all the hard work already done including plans, working drawings, structural engineering, soil test and engineering reports. This well planned design for a double storey home of 29.2 sq approx consists of a lounge room, informal open plan living, 4 spacious bedroom of which 2 have full ensuites and walk in robes, upstairs sitting room, open study and double garage. Added to this appealing design is a fantastic location with parklands, public transport, Derrimut Village, and easy access to Western Ring Road. Contact us today for more information and to secure this unique allotment.

An Immaculate Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be prepared to fall in love with this quality built Porter Davis home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list.
Walk up towards its impressive north facing grand facade and enter a home that is sure to impress with bright interior and warm family character and charm. A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk in robe & ensuite to a massive master bedroom, spacious dual living zones including a separate theatre room, super-sized meals and family area that opens up to the outdoor entertaining area perfect for large-scale family gatherings and a fully equipped kitchen with great storage & ample Caesarstone bench space.
Located to perfection, with just a short stroll to local park, schools, Derrimut Village shopping centre , transport and jam-packed with quality extras including ducted heating, evap cooling, alarm system, low maintenance manicured front and back yards , double car garage with internal access, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry and much much more!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Only through inspection will you truly appreciate the effort and love that has gone into this fantastic federation style residence. Positive first impressions are assured with a striking façade with lovely fretwork providing great street appeal and a paved walkway surrounded by beautiful mature roses leading to a gorgeous lead light window front door. Upon entry it only gets better as you are greeted by stunning polished jarrah hardwood floors and a sense of warmth and coziness as this home's charm and superb condition and presentation begin to win you over. Towards the rear of the property you will find a lovely open plan kitchen that overlooks the dining and main living area leading out to the low maintenance rear yard that provides ample space for entertaining guests or a secure place for kids to play. Sleeping quarters comprise 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs with the huge master offering a WIR and ensuite. Completing the home is a central main bathroom, large laundry, double remote garage with rear roller door access and separate lounge that can also be used as a study or easily converted into a 4th bedroom to suit any buyers particular requirements. Other features include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, monitored alarm system, quality window furnishings, down lights, storage shed and so much more. A wonderful opportunity to purchase not just a house, but a home in the truest sense of the word that will provide many years of joyous living and precious future memories awaits one lucky purchaser.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
An exciting opportunity presents for one lucky purchaser to secure this magnificent double storey residence. Owner built to exacting standards, this home has been crafted with the finest materials and quite simply oozes quality and is classed above the other stock standard properties in the area. Walking up to the oversize custom front door prepare on entry to be blown away by the soaring high ceilings, exquisite engineered timber flooring and magnificent staircase. Towards the rear you will find a massive kitchen that overlooks the dining and main living area and leads out to the enclosed alfresco and great size rear yard creating a fantastic indoor/outdoor zone for entertaining whilst a separate lounge discreetly placed at the front of the property is perfect for those more formal occasions. A powder room and large laundry with direct access to outside complete the ground level. Moving upstairs you will find a spacious retreat area, 4 great sized bedrooms, the master with fitted WIR and ensuite and 3 remaining bedrooms serviced by the superb main bathroom. Completing this ultimate package in luxury living is a prime location with all amenities including Derrimut Village, shopping, cafes, restaurants, schools, childcare, sporting facilities, transport and Deer Park train station all just a leisurely stroll from your front door. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate exactly what is on offer. Please note full list of special features will be provided upon inspection.

Description:
Connection, Class and Contemporary Quality...
Backing onto the beautiful Melford Walk, close to Balmoral Park, St Lawrence and Derrimut primary schools and Mt Derrimut Road shopping, restaurants and cafes, this bright, modern and contemporary home is positioned for a life of comfort, class and convenience.
Featuring bedrooms with robes, a master with en-suite and walk-in robe, an open family, dining and kitchen space and a formal front lounge, this is a property of great natural light and plenty of room for the growing family.
Modern floor tiles, a masterful kitchen with feature floating bench, stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops, evaporative cooling, ducted heating and a private backyard with covered outdoor entertaining combine to form a fabulous family offering.
With easy access to the Western Freeway, Williamstown, Melbourne's Tullamarine Airport and the city - quality, quiet and connected living awaits the lucky new owners.
- Well-located home with plenty of natural light, open living, kitchen and dining area
- Spacious kitchen with feature floating bench, breakfast bar, gas cooking, oven, range hood, walk-in pantry and plenty of cupboard and bench space
- Bedrooms with robes, master with en-suite, walk-in robe and direct access to the outdoor deck
- Modern bathroom, separate laundry, evaporative cooling and ducted heating
- Covered outdoor entertaining, private gardens and a double lock up garage
Also visit the stand alone website at: 38chartwellcrescentderrimut.com
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Insights: 38 Chartwell Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Those that enjoy entertaining large groups of family and friends will absolutely love this Derrimut residence. An open plan kitchen/dining/living space spills out to the huge deck with enclosed pergola that when combined create an enormous indoor/outdoor zone providing the perfect setting for those memorable family gatherings and get togethers. Sleeping quarters currently comprise 3 spacious bedrooms, the master with WIR and ensuite whist the additional 2 bedrooms with BIRs are serviced by the central main bathroom. For buyers that require an extra bedroom a step up formal dining space offers the option of easily being converted into a 4th bedroom. A separate study, large lounge and laundry with direct access to outside complete the property. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, contemporary flooring, low maintenance gardens, huge rear yard with extensive concreting and storage shed, alarm, security cameras and double remote garage with internal access and bonus rear roller door access to the rear with plenty of additional secure undercover parking for cars, boats or any other toys you may have.
Insights: 11 Southsea Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Perfect Location
Welcome to Lot 2053 (141) Lennon Parkway, Derrimut.
Located in a premier location within the heart of Derrimut and in an established and desirable neighbourhood, this great allotment gives you the opportunity to build the home of your dreams. Nestled amongst beautiful homes and close to all amenities this prime allotment is titled and ready to build on now - be quick as this won’t last long!
* Land size of 560 sqm (approx)
* Wide frontage of 16 metres (approx)
* East/west orientation
* Titled and ready to build on
* Close to all amenities including Derrimut Village, public transport, schools and childcare and easy access to freeway
* Only 18Km to CBD
* Picture and plan for illustration purposes only
